Hello, I'm Phillip.

As a web designer, I aim to make lightweight, visually appealing webpages.

As a programmer, I aim to make somewhat useless, somewhat helpful scripts and stuff.

As a content creator, I aim to make easy to follow and concise tutorials about Linux and open-source technologies.
